title: Keanu Reeves and Carrie-Anne Moss on making The Matrix Awakens with Epic Games
description: Epic Games made an interactive Matrix experience to show off its upcoming Unreal Engine 5. We sat down with the two stars of the demo and the Matrix movies, Keanu Reeves and Carrie-Ann Moss, to talk about how technology is blurring the line between whats real and virtual, what to expect from the new Matrix Resurrections movie, and a lot more.  0:00 - Intro 0:42 - The Matrix Awakens  9:00 - Metaverse 10:00 - Cryptocurrency  11:06 - Matrix video game 12:10 - Matrix Resurrections 16:50 - Cyberpunk and VR porn 18:40 - Endcard  Subscribe:  Like The Verge on Facebook:  Follow on Twitter:  Follow on Instagram:   Why'd You Push That Button Podcast:  The Vergecast Podcast:  More about our podcasts:   Read More:  Community guidelines:  Wallpapers from The Verge:   Subscribe to Verge Science on YouTube, a new home base for our explorations into the future of science:
